I guess you just gave me an excuse to let everyone
know I'm still alive, but I'll be gone for a VERY long
time, quite possibly until I start college (two years
from now), but when I do I already have a pre-approved
char to start up with (P.S., could someone tell me
whats happened to Flicker lately?).

--- Nic <Proudwing500k@...> wrote:
> Hi there!
> 
> Thanks, guys for taking my chars for now. I won't be
> posting as a 
> player for some times, but I might do something
> else.
> 
> I don't think I'll act as a player right now, but I
> stay active in 
> the council. This also means the upcoming
> storylines.
> 
> Airly and I have been talking about the storylines
> and we might start 
> them really soon. A feature that would be included
> is Non-player 
> characters (NPC) that would be council-controlled.
> Also, depending on 
> the intensity of the fight, they would be quite
> killable.
> 
> Be on the look-out. These storylines will be there
> soon (actually, as 
> soon as we can agree on them!).
> 
> Also, I'm still in the council. Any technical
> question, I'm there for 
> it.
> 
> Nic
> 
>
